order by ${orderByClause}

update recharge_log
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.select: SELECT * from recharge_log t1 where (t1.isup = '0' or t1.isup is NULL) and createTime<=#{time} ORDER BY t1.createTime asc;
mapper.update: UPDATE recharge_log set isup = '1' where id in(${ids})
